title.en: To Get - Obtaining Objects & Things (Conseguir objetos)
title.es: To Get - Obtaining Objects & Things (Conseguir objetos)

description.en: Learn to use 'to get' for obtaining objects, things, and results. Use 'to get' when you obtain or acquire something physical or abstract, not for managing to do actions.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'to get' para obtener objetos, cosas y resultados. Usa 'to get' cuando obtienes o adquieres algo físico o abstracto, no para conseguir hacer acciones.

prompt.es: Él consiguió las últimas dos entradas que quedaban.

exercises.solution: He got the last two tickets left.

tip.en: Use 'to get' when obtaining objects or things, not actions.
tip.es: Usa 'to get' cuando obtienes objetos o cosas, no acciones.

prompt.es: ¡Consigue los últimos éxitos en este fantástico disco recopilatorio!

exercises.solution: Get the latest hits on this great compilation album!

tip.en: Use 'to get' when obtaining objects or things, not actions.
tip.es: Usa 'to get' cuando obtienes objetos o cosas, no acciones.

exercises.solution: She got what she wanted.

tip.en: 'To get what...' is very common for obtaining desired things.
tip.es: 'To get what...' es muy común para obtener cosas deseadas.

prompt.es: Al final consiguieron un descuento bárbaro.

exercises.solution: They got a massive discount in the end.

tip.en: Use 'to get' when obtaining objects or things, not actions.
tip.es: Usa 'to get' cuando obtienes objetos o cosas, no acciones.

exercises.solution: They got what they deserved.

tip.en: 'To get what...' is very common for obtaining desired things.
tip.es: 'To get what...' es muy común para obtener cosas deseadas.

exercises.solution: Did you get what you were looking for?

tip.en: In questions, use 'Did you get what...' for past tense.
tip.es: En preguntas, usa 'Did you get what...' para pasado.

exercises.solution: Did she get what she asked for?

tip.en: In questions, use 'Did you get what...' for past tense.
tip.es: En preguntas, usa 'Did you get what...' para pasado.

exercises.solution: Did they get what they wanted?

tip.en: In questions, use 'Did you get what...' for past tense.
tip.es: En preguntas, usa 'Did you get what...' para pasado.

exercises.solution: Did they get the books they were after?

tip.en: 'Were after' means 'were looking for' or 'wanted to get'.
tip.es: 'Were after' significa 'estaban buscando' o 'querían conseguir'.

exercises.solution: Did you get the record you were searching for?

tip.en: In questions, use 'Did you get what...' for past tense.
tip.es: En preguntas, usa 'Did you get what...' para pasado.

prompt.es: Conseguí un trabajo nuevo la semana pasada.

exercises.solution: I got a new job last week.

tip.en: Use 'to get' when obtaining objects or things, not actions.
tip.es: Usa 'to get' cuando obtienes objetos o cosas, no acciones.

exercises.solution: Did you get the car keys?

tip.en: In questions, use 'Did you get' for past tense with objects.
tip.es: En preguntas, usa 'Did you get' para pasado con objetos.

prompt.es: Ella consiguió una beca para la universidad.

exercises.solution: She got a scholarship for university.

tip.es: Usa 'to get' cuando obtienes objetos o cosas, no acciones.

exercises.solution: Did you get the information you needed?

tip.en: Information is treated like an object with 'to get'.
tip.es: La información se trata como un objeto con 'to get'.
